trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_000_001<tab>I help with the initiative's artifact search efforts, but you'll want to speak with Searchingway before you worry about any of that!
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_001_001<tab>Interested in searching for an artifact or two? If you're after drone modules or have some discoveries to share, you're in the right place.
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_SYSTEM_001_002<tab>Speak with Kaede to exchange and obtain items related to the initiative's artifact search endeavors.
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_SYSTEM_001_003<tab>To begin scanning for artifacts, you will first need to acquire drone modules.

TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_SYSTEM_001_004<tab>Using a drone module will launch a reconnaissance drone and initiate its artifact scanning subroutines. Discovered artifacts will be displayed on your map.
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_SYSTEM_001_005<tab>Once you have traveled to the displayed location, access the artifact to conduct analysis and thus obtain an ancient record.
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_SYSTEM_001_006<tab>Different grades of ancient records exist, each garnering a proportionate reward upon appraisal.
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>For more details regarding the search for artifacts, consult the Exploration Guide on your exotablet.
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_002_001<tab>Perhaps you need a drone module or two? Or have you brought me some ancient records to appraise?

TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_003_001<tab>Drone modules are used to launch reconnaissance drones. The devices are optimized for use on a specific star, so they can only be used in their intended environment.

TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_003_002<tab>Truly exceptional contributors are awarded with dronebits when completing stellar missions. If you bring me sufficient quantities, I'll gladly provide drone modules in exchange!
TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_004_001<tab>They're repositories of data found within ancient artifacts. Our researchers would do just about anything to get their hands─or paws─on one.

TEXT_CTSWKSTREASURE_00966_TALK_ACTOR_004_002<tab>Not all ancient records are created equally, though. Each is assigned a grade based on the volume of information contained within─the higher the grade, the greater the research value. I'll be happy to appraise your finds and offer appropriate compensation.
